speaker.whotheyare: Kayvon Tehranian is the CEO and founder of Foundation, a platform that enables creators to use blockchain to monetize their work and build new connections with collectors.
speaker.whylisten: Kayvon Tehranian has worked as a creative technologist for more than a decade. He started as a software engineer at Google and held leadership positions at various startups before entering the rapidly evolving world of crypto. He is deeply committed to building the new creative economy by harnessing the untapped potential of the internet, Web3 and the Metaverse.
